info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 07 at 12:16PM MDT by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Meade County through 1245 PM MDT... At 1216 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Piedmont, or 11 miles southeast of Sturgis, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Summerset, Piedmont and Tilford. This includes Interstate 90 in South Dakota between Mile Markers 36 and 46. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
